Random - Class in vlille.strategy
A strategy to redistribute the vehicles in the stations using a random algorithm.
Random() - Constructor for class vlille.strategy.Random
A strategy to redistribute the vehicles in the stations using a random algorithm
redistribute() - Method in class vlille.controlcenter.ControlCenter
Redistribution vehicles in the stations If a station is empty or full for more than two interval of time, the control center will redistribute the vehicles in the stations
redistribute(List<Station>) - Method in class vlille.strategy.Random
Redistribution vehicles in the stations If a station is empty or full for more than two interval of time, the control center will redistribute the vehicles in the stations A Random redistribution algorithm is use : a random station is chosen to distribute, and so on until there is no more vehicle to distribute
redistribute(List<Station>) - Method in interface vlille.strategy.RedistributionStrategy
Redistribution vehicles in stations
redistribute(List<Station>) - Method in class vlille.strategy.RoundRobin
Redistribution vehicles in the stations If a station is empty or full for more than two interval of time, the control center will redistribute the vehicles in the stations A Round Robin redistribution algorithm is use : the first station is chosen, then the second, then the third, and so on until there is no more vehicle to distribute
RedistributionStrategy - Interface in vlille.strategy
A strategy to redistribute the vehicles in the stations
